text: Lurtigen () was a municipality of the district of See in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Courlevon, Jeuss, Lurtigen and Salvenach merged into Murten.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 3 February 2016 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
